com.sanjay.common.util

Class RandomGeneratorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sanjay.common.util.RandomGeneratorUtil

  • public class RandomGeneratorUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility to generate random password, double number, int number with criteria.
    Author:
    SANJAY
    See Also:
    RandomGeneratorUtil.CombinationOf

    • Method Detail

      • generatePassword

        public static java.lang.String generatePassword(int size,
                                RandomGeneratorUtil.CombinationOf passwordCombination)
        Returns a random String password of a int size with CombinationOf RandomGeneratorUtil.CombinationOf.
        Parameters:
        size - int value of a password, should not less than 3 otherwise IllegalArgumentException will be thrown: 
         if (size < 3) {
             LOG.error("Password size is less then 3");
             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid password size: " + size);
         }
        passwordCombination - CombinationOf enumeration value for password combination.
        Returns:
        a random String password of a int size with CombinationOf RandomGeneratorUtil.CombinationOf.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if int size is less than 3.

      • generatePin

        public static java.lang.String generatePin(int size)
        Returns a random String representation of int value of length int abs size Math.abs(int).
        Parameters:
        size - the length of random number to be returned as String.
        Returns:
        a random String value of length int abs size Math.abs(int).

      • generatePin

        public static java.lang.String generatePin(int minimumSize,
                           int maximumSize)
        Returns a random String representation of int value of random length from minimumSize to maximumSize.
        Parameters:
        minimumSize - (inclusive) minimum length of random number.
        maximumSize - (exclusive) maximum length of random number.
        Returns:
        a random String representation of int value of random length from minimumSize to maximumSize.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - as if: 
         maximumSize - minimumSize is not positive.
        See Also:
        randomIntValue(int, int), generatePin(int)

      • randomIntValue

        public static int randomIntValue(int minimumValue,
                 int maximumValue)
        Returns a int value between int minimumValue(inclusive) and the int maximumValue (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        minimumValue - (inclusive) random number minimum value.
        maximumValue - (exclusive) random number value less than.
        Returns:
        a int value between int minimumValue(inclusive) and the int maximumValue (exclusive).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - as if: 
         maximumValue - minimumValue is not positive.

      • randomDoubleValue

        public static double randomDoubleValue(double minimumValue,
                       double maximumValue)
        Returns a double value , greater than or equal to double minimumValue and less than double maximumValue.
        Parameters:
        minimumValue - (inclusive) random number minimum value.
        maximumValue - (exclusive) random number value less than.
        Returns:
        a double value , greater than or equal to double minimumValue and less than double maximumValue.
